recipe_name: Spinach and Persimmon Salad with Goat Cheese and Pomegranate
ingredients: 1  Fuyu persimmon, peeled and cored, 2 cups roughly chopped spinach, 3 tablespoons pomegranate seeds, 2 ounces goat cheese, crumbled, 1 tablespoon sliced almonds
nutrition: Total Fat 24g 31%, Saturated Fat 8g 40%, Cholesterol 22mg 7%, Sodium 295mg 13%, Total Carbohydrate 12g 4%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 29mg 145%, Calcium 147mg 11%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 443mg 9%
